author: Julia Stick
review:
THIS PLACE IS A SCAM! DO NOT MOVE HERE I BEG YOU!
This place is an absolute nightmare, and was before we moved in, and continues to be.

author: Oliver Bibb
review: The PTLA Property Management company bought this property took over it as of YESTERDAY and I'm already upset. They gave notice yesterday in the EVENING on a FRIDAY about a bunch of things changing, didn't answer 8+ voice calls or messages

author: Pootaro
review: I have never been more disrespected by a company In my life and when I was messed up by snow-closures making it impossible for me to raise enough money from my closed job for my rent the process of working with eviction prevention services

ownerResponse.text: Hi there, We pride ourselves in creating a sense of community through respect and transparency. We certainly strive to offer outstanding service and value with every single interaction. We were not able to locate a resident by your name, so  More

author: Sam Surgeon
review: I didn't have functional internet for the first 6 months I lived there. I complained relentlessly, went into the office frequently and didn't receive help until the pandemic, when I was sassed by a staff member for requesting internet

ownerResponse.text: Hello Sam, Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback. We are sorry to hear you do not care for our management team. We believe they do a wonderful job and care about the wellbeing of our residents. I am unable to locate you in  More

author: Nicholas Lam
review: I've lived here for over 2 years, its a good location and decent apartment. The price is a little high but not terrible. The worst thing is they recently changed the internet, so there is no wired connection anymore, they just decided to

author: Maia Avila-Maechler
review: Ive lived here for two years. The place is small. I was placed with horrible roommates. The rent to high for a freaking room! Im glad Im leaving here soon. The living space small.  No living space. The kitchen is outdated. The whole building is outdated.  Stay away from this place!

author: Taylor Campbell
review: Everyone in the office is very sweet and diligent. Unfortunately I was placed with a terrible roommate and I was very upset that my place didnt appear to be in good condition. Fortunately the maintenance team is responsive and helpful.

ownerResponse.text:
Dear Taylor,

Thank you for your feedback. We really appreciate having you as a resident at  More

author: Janna
review: They didn't give me a mail key when I first got my keys. They also gave me a laundry key that didn't work.

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Jana,

We apologize for your negative experience during your move in process. We are  More

author: Bella H
review: Terrible small living spaces. Over priced. Little to no general maintenance and monitoring. No cameras or trusty security

author: Zabhahs Yusuf
review: Good move in process, excellent service. Will update if future situation arises

author: Andreas Silkiss
review: Super friendly staff and very easy service! No major complaints from me!

author: Tyrek Myles
review: Great move in process. The staff was extremely kind!!

ownerResponse.text: I'm so sorry you've had a negative experience Kimberley. Please contact the leasing office so we can make things right!
